name: Don't Lose Control (Tailor Bird)
description:
Don't Lose Control is a platformer game with made for GMTK Game Jam 2020. When your stress level will be too high you won't be able to control your character.

Sounds:

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-platformer-sfx

https://opengameart.org/content/laser-fire

https://opengameart.org/content/punch-slap-n-kick

https://opengameart.org/content/15-monster-gruntpaindeath-sounds
